post_title: FS Chance Yellow Tolstoi PSA 3, Tinker Knees SGC 2,Tinker On SGC 2
post_content:
Hey all, I need to move some duplicate fronts this weekend.

Here we have two freshly graded Tinker SGC 2’s that just came back and a nice front back combo with the PSA 3 Chance Yellow Port with a Tolstoi back.

Chance Yellow Tolstoi Back PSA 3 - $825
Tinker Knees SGC 2 - $300
Tinker Bat On SGC 2 - EBAY

PayPal or Zelle for payment. PM her or email at [url]upperhandisforemost@yahoo.com[/url]

Thanks,
